mapper.select: select go.products_id , go.order_no , go.order_status , go.op_id , ui.member_level_id , ui.avatar_resource_key , go.user_id , go.deliver_time , go.is_deleted , go.payment_amount , ui.password , pi.price , go.complete_time , go.actual_amount , go.tel , go.refund_amount , go.refund_type , pi.mini_program_path , ose.status_name , go.shipping_method , go.quality , oi.payment_order_no , go.total_amount , go.refund_status , go.delivery_status , oi.product_info_product_info_id , go.order_type , go.payment_channel , ui.phone_number , go.remark , go.shipping_fee , go.discount_amount , go.payment_order_id , go.tracking_number , pi.product_name , pi.coupon_amount , go.table_name , ui.email , go.refund_id , go.shipping_address , go.create_time , oi.quantity , oi.total_price , go.cancel_time , go.refund_reason , oi.user_info_user_info_id_5 , go.payment_time , go.field_name , go.refund_no , oi.order_info_id , go.pay_status , go.recipient , go.shipping_company , pi.image_resource_key , go.update_time , oi.order_status_enum_id , ui.username FROM order_info oi left join user_info ui on oi.user_info_user_info_id_5 = ui.user_info_id left join product_info pi on oi.product_info_product_info_id = pi.product_info_id left join order_status_enum ose on oi.order_status_enum_id = ose.order_status_enum_id left join general_orders go on oi.payment_order_no = go.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select go.products_id , go.order_no , go.order_status , go.op_id , ui.member_level_id , ui.avatar_resource_key , go.user_id , go.deliver_time , go.is_deleted , go.payment_amount , ui.password , pi.price , go.complete_time , go.actual_amount , go.tel , go.refund_amount , go.refund_type , pi.mini_program_path , ose.status_name , go.shipping_method , go.quality , oi.payment_order_no , go.total_amount , go.refund_status , go.delivery_status , oi.product_info_product_info_id , go.order_type , go.payment_channel , ui.phone_number , go.remark , go.shipping_fee , go.discount_amount , go.payment_order_id , go.tracking_number , pi.product_name , pi.coupon_amount , go.table_name , ui.email , go.refund_id , go.shipping_address , go.create_time , oi.quantity , oi.total_price , go.cancel_time , go.refund_reason , oi.user_info_user_info_id_5 , go.payment_time , go.field_name , go.refund_no , oi.order_info_id , go.pay_status , go.recipient , go.shipping_company , pi.image_resource_key , go.update_time , oi.order_status_enum_id , ui.username FROM order_info oi left join user_info ui on oi.user_info_user_info_id_5 = ui.user_info_id left join product_info pi on oi.product_info_product_info_id = pi.product_info_id left join order_status_enum ose on oi.order_status_enum_id = ose.order_status_enum_id left join general_orders go on oi.payment_order_no = go.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select go.products_id , go.order_no , go.order_status , go.op_id , ui.member_level_id , ui.avatar_resource_key , go.user_id , go.deliver_time , go.is_deleted , go.payment_amount , ui.password , pi.price , go.complete_time , go.actual_amount , go.tel , go.refund_amount , go.refund_type , pi.mini_program_path , ose.status_name , go.shipping_method , go.quality , oi.payment_order_no , go.total_amount , go.refund_status , go.delivery_status , oi.product_info_product_info_id , go.order_type , go.payment_channel , ui.phone_number , go.remark , go.shipping_fee , go.discount_amount , go.payment_order_id , go.tracking_number , pi.product_name , pi.coupon_amount , go.table_name , ui.email , go.refund_id , go.shipping_address , go.create_time , oi.quantity , oi.total_price , go.cancel_time , go.refund_reason , oi.user_info_user_info_id_5 , go.payment_time , go.field_name , go.refund_no , oi.order_info_id , go.pay_status , go.recipient , go.shipping_company , pi.image_resource_key , go.update_time , oi.order_status_enum_id , ui.username FROM order_info oi left join user_info ui on oi.user_info_user_info_id_5 = ui.user_info_id left join product_info pi on oi.product_info_product_info_id = pi.product_info_id left join order_status_enum ose on oi.order_status_enum_id = ose.order_status_enum_id left join general_orders go on oi.payment_order_no = go.id where oi.order_info_id = #{id}
